## Biography
Meg Ellingwood is a second-year student in the PhD program in statistics at CMU.
She graduated from Kenyon College and briefly taught high school statistics
before entering graduate school. Meg participated as a student in CMSACamp
Summer 2020, as a TA in Summer 2021 and 2022, and she is thrilled to be an
instructor this summer. She is interested in applications of statistics and
data science in sports, public health, and neuroscience.
